villaIntro.title: Villa Lithos
villaIntro.tagline: A 9-bedroom luxury retreat with space to unwind and room for memorable gatherings
bodyParagraphs: Villa Lithos is a stunning 800m² luxury villa set on a 5000m² private estate in Porto Rafti, Attica. Designed for up to 22 guests, this exclusive property features nine bedrooms, ten bathrooms, and generous spaces for families, groups of friends, or corporate retreats.

Enjoy the heated infinity pool with panoramic sea views, unwind in the jacuzzi, rejuvenate in the outdoor sauna, or challenge friends on the padel court. The villa also offers a fully equipped gym, private elevator, dual lounges, and secure parking.
spaceParagraphs: Inside, the contemporary interiors blend modern design with warm Mediterranean touches. Two spacious living rooms, on the ground floor and lower level, provide versatile spaces for relaxation, conversation, or quiet moments.
The designer kitchen is fully equipped with premium appliances and a walk-in pantry, perfect for preparing memorable meals during your stay near Athens.

concierge.title: Concierge Services
concierge.kicker: Personalized hospitality tailored to your stay.
paragraphs: At Villa Lithos, our dedicated concierge team manages every detail of your stay, whether you're visiting with family or hosting a corporate retreat in Porto Rafti.
From arranging private chefs and pre-stocking the villa to daily housekeeping and curating authentic Greek experiences, we ensure your time near Athens is effortless and memorable.
Private guests and corporate groups receive the same meticulous attention. Every stay at our luxury villa runs seamlessly.
concierge.closingText: From small requests to grand arrangements, we're here to help.
